local_intent: Execute a straight push on the T-block along +Y (90°) for 0.2 m, then briefly stabilize and verify visibility.
assumptions: Tool is close enough for pushing after alignment; contact is acceptable without an explicit lowering step.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: align, set yaw=90°, push t_block 0.2 at 90°, then brief wait; values use the same binned timeouts and distances.
